title: Add navigation bar for future pages
description: Create a navigation bar that links to current pages and placeholders for future pages.

title: Fix scraper: earnedPoints contains date data, totalPoints always 0
description: The scraper's XPath extraction is incorrectly parsing assignment data. earnedPoints contains corrupted date values (e.g., 242025 instead of score) and totalPoints is always 0. Only 1 of 120 assignments has correct data. Root cause: XPath selectors are extracting the wrong text nodes from the assignment detail dialog. Need to debug the dialog structure and fix the extraction logic in enhanced-scraper.cjs lines 338-405.

title: Fix Skyward scraper points extraction
description: Enhanced scraper returns earned/total points as 0 because it parses modal text; use provided DOM XPaths for earned (/html/body/div[6]/div[1]/div[2]/div[1]/div[4]/div/table/tbody/tr[2]/td[2]/text()[1]) and total (/text()[2]) plus due/assigned date XPaths to extract real values and update cached output.

title: Use scraped assignments in class calculators
description: Integrate scraped graded assignments/point totals into per-class GradeCalculator so results reflect actual points.

title: Display dynamic Missing.Quests total
description: Expose total Missing.Quests count dynamically on UI title rather than static label.

title: Map scraped classIds to actual class metadata
description: Scraper groups assignments by classId correctly (9 groups), but classIdMap is not populated due to DOM traversal issues after page expansion. Need to map classIds (42889, 42895, 43049, 43162, 43424, 43666, 44014, 44290, 44463) to actual class names/periods/teachers from grades.json so class pages show correct metadata.

title: Fix scraped assign/due dates mis-populated with grades
description: AssignDate/DueDate fields in scraped assignments sometimes contain numeric grade values (e.g., '24'); parse should keep dates separate from points.

title: Fix Assignments log mobile layout
description: Assignments log is not mobile-friendly; adjust layout/styles for small screens.

title: Render scraped grades on class pages
description: Pipe scraped assignment data into /classes/[classId] views so per-class pages show real grades.

title: Remove assignDate from scraper output and normalize dueDate format
description: Remove assignDate fields from scraper outputs (raw + organized). Normalize dueDate to MM/DD/YYYY only in scraper data.

title: Add fun stats page with grade history chart
description: Create a stats page that uses grade_history to show fun, engaging metrics plus a chart.
